content:
# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Japanese

# Target Fragment
dusty shelves

# Context
The library basement had been locked for years. <fragment>dusty shelves</fragment> Light fell in narrow beams.

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Japanese

# Target Fragment
fading laughter

# Context
The party was ending. <fragment>fading laughter</fragment> Only a few guests remained near the doorway.

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Japanese

# Target Fragment
fresh ink

# Context
She signed the contract quickly. <fragment>fresh ink</fragment> The window was open, letting in cold air.
